name: Answered Prayers
summary:
Answered Prayers is a Yume Nikki fangame made by Klaufir in RPG Maker 2003. 
One of the more well-known English fangames, Answered Prayers is also one of the 'lighter' Yume Nikki fangames. This game has plenty of areas to explore, with little gore/blood compared to many other Yume Nikki derivatives. As of Version 0.03, the game has been put on hiatus, according to the official website.
